ygData.subject: PUTting an unnamed resource
ygData.msgSnippet: I m designing the interface of a system that stores and indexes documents (word docs etc).  My intention is that the service should be human readable as well

I'm designing the interface of a system that stores and indexes documents (=
word docs etc).  My intention is that the service should be human readable =
as well as easy to integrate programmatically - a resource-oriented REST in=
terface would be perfect.

Multiple documents in the same 'bucket' could ha=
ve the same file name, so I an using a unique identifer in my URLs, e.g. GE=
T /documents/sales/6543213

Really, that resource should be uploaded by a c=
orresponding PUT /documents/sales/6543213.  However, I'm using a enterprise=
 document management system behind that scenes which creates these identifi=
ers, so the user cannot decide what their unique ID will be.

I guess I cou=
ld handle a PUT to /documents/sales/ and return a 301 to the new resource? =
 Would that be the correct way to handle it?
